summary: Cincinnati-based Griid has three mining facilities in the U.S. and aims to have capacity of 734 megawatts operational by 2023.
title: Griid Infrastructure Set for NYSE Listing Through $3.3B Merger
content: Griid Infrastructure, which owns and operates bitcoin mining facilities, is to list on the New York Stock Exchange through a merger with Adit EdTech Acquisition Corp., a special purpose acquisition company.
Read more: Blockchain ‘Blank Check’ SPAC Announces $100M IPO to Fund Acquisitions
UPDATE (Nov. 30, 16:24 UTC): Clarifies Adit EdTech Acquisition Corp. is a special purpose acquisition company.
